title: Suzuki Motorcycle sales up 27.55 pc at 86,750 units in September
description: "This is the highest ever overall monthly as well as domestic monthly sales figure recorded by the company since its inception in 2006," Suzuki Motorcycle India Pvt Ltd (SMIPL) said in a statement.
